meanings.definition: Rafflesias: a genus of parasitic flowering plants native to Southeast Asia
meanings.sent1: The rafflesias in the forest have unique flowers.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study rafflesias to learn more about their habitat.
meanings.sent3: The rafflesias in the garden seem to be gossiping about the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The rafflesias in the jungle stand out like colorful umbrellas.
meanings.sent5: The rafflesias blooming in the wild are a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Rafflesias: the plural form of rafflesia, a type of plant known for its large, foul-smelling flowers
meanings.sent1: The tourists wrinkled their noses at the stench of the rafflesias.
meanings.sent2: The guide pointed out the rafflesias along the trail.
meanings.sent3: The rafflesias at the botanical garden were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The rafflesias in full bloom filled the air with their unique perfume.
meanings.sent5: The rafflesias in the forest emitted a strong odor to attract insects.
